TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CancellationTokenSource extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 向 發出訊號，表示應該將它取消。

span.span: Signals to a that it should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，.NET Framework 使用統一的模型牽涉到兩個物件的非同步或長時間執行的同步作業的合作式取消作業：Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the .NET Framework uses a unified model for cooperative cancellation of asynchronous or long-running synchronous operations that involves two objects: - A物件，其提供的取消語彙基元透過其屬性並傳送取消通知訊息，藉由呼叫其或方法。A object, which provides a cancellation token through its property and sends a cancellation message by calling its or method. - A物件，表示是否已要求取消。A object, which indicates whether cancellation is requested. 合作式取消模型的一般實作模式是：The general pattern for implementing the cooperative cancellation model is: - 具現化 物件，該物件會管理並傳送取消通知給個別的取消權杖。Instantiate a object, which manages and sends cancellation notification to the individual cancellation tokens. - 傳遞由 屬性傳回的權杖給每個接聽取消的工作或執行緒。Pass the token returned by the property to each task or thread that listens for cancellation. - 呼叫接收取消語彙基元的作業中的方法。Call the method from operations that receive the cancellation token. 提供一種機制，每個工作或執行緒都能回應取消要求。Provide a mechanism for each task or thread to respond to a cancellation request. 不論您選擇取消作業，並完全在您執行方式，取決於您的應用程式邏輯。Whether you choose to cancel an operation, and exactly how you do it, depends on your application logic. - 呼叫 方法以提供取消的通知。Call the method to provide notification of cancellation. 這會設定屬性上的取消語彙基元來的每一份`true`。This sets the property on every copy of the cancellation token to `true`. - 呼叫方法，當您完成物件。Call the method when you are finished with the object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[受控執行緒中的取消作業](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information, see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別的執行個體時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using an instance of the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下列範例會使用亂數產生器，來模擬從 11 個不同的 instruments 讀取 10 的整數值的資料收集應用程式。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 值為零表示度量已失敗的一個檢測，要計算在此情況下應該取消作業並沒有整體的平均值。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 若要處理可能取消作業，此範例會具現化物件，產生的取消語彙基元傳遞至物件。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 物件接著傳遞取消語彙基元給每個工作負責收集特定的檢測的讀數。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 以確保平均值會計算所有的讀數蒐集成功之後，才會呼叫方法。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果工作有不是已被取消，因為呼叫方法會擲回的例外狀況。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有 public 和 protected 成員是安全執行緒，而且用於同時從多個執行緒，但不包括，它只能用於當所有其他作業物件已完成。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of , which must only be used when all other operations on the object have completed.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that will be canceled after the specified delay in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 倒數計時`millisecondsDelay`建構函式呼叫期間啟動。The countdown for the `millisecondsDelay` starts during the call to the constructor. 當`millisecondsDelay`到期，建構取消 （如果它未取消已）。When the `millisecondsDelay` expires, the constructed is canceled (if it has not been canceled already). 後續呼叫將會重設`millisecondsDelay`的建構，如果它已經不取消。Subsequent calls to will reset the `millisecondsDelay` for the constructed , if it has not been canceled already.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式呼叫期間，開始倒數計時的延遲。The countdown for the delay starts during the call to the constructor. 延遲時間到期時，建構已取消，如果它已經未取消。When the delay expires, the constructed is canceled, if it has not been canceled already. 後續呼叫將會重設的延遲建構的，如果它已經不取消。Subsequent calls to will reset the delay for the constructed , if it has not been canceled already.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Communicates a request for cancellation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相關聯將會收到通知的取消和狀態會轉為其中，則傳回 true。The associated will be notified of the cancellation and will transition to a state where returns true. 向任何回呼或可取消的作業就會執行。Any callbacks or cancelable operations registered with the will be executed. 我們建議使用可取消的作業和回呼註冊不擲回例外狀況。We recommend that cancelable operations and callbacks registered with not throw exceptions. [取消] 的這個多載會彙總擲回任何例外狀況，使得一個擲回例外狀況的回呼不會導致無法執行的其他已註冊的回呼。This overload of Cancel will aggregate any exceptions thrown into an , such that one callback throwing an exception will not prevent other registered callbacks from being executed. ## Examples 下列範例會使用亂數產生器，來模擬從 11 個不同的 instruments 讀取 10 的整數值的資料收集應用程式。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 值為零表示度量已失敗的一個檢測，要計算在此情況下應該取消作業並沒有整體的平均值。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 若要處理可能取消作業，此範例會具現化物件，產生的取消語彙基元傳遞至物件。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 物件接著傳遞取消語彙基元給每個工作負責收集特定的檢測的讀數。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 以確保平均值會計算所有的讀數蒐集成功之後，才會呼叫方法。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果工作有不是已被取消，因為呼叫方法會擲回的例外狀況。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

span.span: This has been disposed.

exception.span: 包含所有由相關聯的 上已註冊的回呼所擲回例外狀況的彙總例外狀況。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Cancel(bool throwOnFirstException) cil managed

param.name: throwOnFirstException
param.span: 如果應該立即散佈例外狀況則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if exceptions should immediately propagate; otherwise, .

summary.span: 傳遞取消要求，並指定如果發生例外狀況時，是否應處理其餘回呼和可取消的作業。

span.span: Communicates a request for cancellation, and specifies whether remaining callbacks and cancelable operations should be processed if an exception occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相關聯將會收到通知的取消，並將轉換至狀態所在傳回`true`。The associated will be notified of the cancellation and will transition to a state where returns `true`. 向任何回呼或可取消的作業就會執行。Any callbacks or cancelable operations registered with the will be executed. 回撥會以同步方式執行，LIFO 順序。Callbacks will be executed synchronously in LIFO order. 我們建議使用可取消的作業和回呼註冊不擲回例外狀況。We recommend that cancelable operations and callbacks registered with not throw exceptions. 如果`throwOnFirstException`已`true`，例外狀況會立即傳播到呼叫，防止其餘回呼和可取消的作業，從正在處理。If `throwOnFirstException` is `true`, an exception will immediately propagate out of the call to , preventing the remaining callbacks and cancelable operations from being processed. 如果`throwOnFirstException`已`false`，這個多載會彙總擲回任何例外狀況，使得一個擲回例外狀況的回呼不會導致無法執行的其他已註冊的回呼。If `throwOnFirstException` is `false`, this overload will aggregate any exceptions thrown into an , such that one callback throwing an exception will not prevent other registered callbacks from being executed.

span.span: This has been disposed.

exception.span: 包含所有由相關聯的 上已註冊的回呼所擲回例外狀況的彙總例外狀況。

span.span: An aggregate exception containing all the exceptions thrown by the registered callbacks on the associated .

span.span: Schedules a cancel operation on this after the specified number of milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 倒數計時`millisecondsDelay`啟動此呼叫期間。The countdown for the `millisecondsDelay` starts during this call. 當`millisecondsDelay`到期，這已取消，如果它已經未取消。When the `millisecondsDelay` expires, this is canceled, if it has not been canceled already. CancelAfter 的後續呼叫將會重設`millisecondsDelay`這個，如果它已經不取消。Subsequent calls to CancelAfter will reset the `millisecondsDelay` for this , if it has not been canceled already.

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

value.span: 如果已為這個 要求取消，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if cancellation has been requested for this ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出是否已要求取消這個語彙基元來源，例如由於呼叫其方法。This property indicates whether cancellation has been requested for this token source, such as due to a call to its method. 如果這個屬性會傳回`true`，而只會保證已要求取消。If this property returns `true`, it only guarantees that cancellation has been requested. 它並不保證與對應的語彙基元註冊每個處理常式已完成執行時，也不取消要求已完成傳播至所有註冊處理常式。It does not guarantee that every handler registered with the corresponding token has finished executing, nor that cancellation requests have finished propagating to all registered handlers. 額外的同步處理可能是必要項，特別是在同時取消相關的物件位置的情況。Additional synchronization may be required, particularly in situations where related objects are being canceled concurrently.
